title: Kone could partner up for Thyssenkrupp elevator bid - Nasdaq.com
text: FRANKFURT, Sept 5 (Reuters) - Finland'sKone  is considering teaming up with a partner to help pull off a bid for Thyssenkrupp's  elevator business, three people familiar with the matter said.

Kone, which analysts say would be a good strategic fit for Thyssenkrupp's elevator division, could mitigate antitrust risks by selling assets in a potential deal to a partner in a consortium, one of the people said.
